title: Rudyard Kipling's How the elephant got his trunk
creator_credit: Lee Mishkin, Nick Bosustow and Stephen Bosustow Productions
brief_description: An animated film based on a story from the “Just So Stories” by Rudyard Kipling. A curious elephant calf sets out to find what the crocodile has for dinner. The crocodile attacks and in his effort to escape the elephant finds his nose somewhat elongated.
